Reviews.Title: A great close-up copy camera
Reviews.Author: David W. Dippel
Reviews.Content: This camera is far superior to any of the pocket cameras on the market for close up photography. It works well with old documents in an archive or close ups of a painting in a museum or the flowers in a garden or the sights in any place you happen to find yourself. It's a surprisingly capable camera that is the equal of much more expensive full sized digital cameras.

Reviews.Title: Happy Customer
Reviews.Author: Karen West
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for the same camera I had that was stolen. I love this camera and was so happy I could find the same model on Amazon. The seller did all I expected.I'm ready for Hawaii.

Reviews.Title: Best Point and Click Camera Around
Reviews.Author: Carol W Unroe
Reviews.Content: This is the best little point and click camera. I researched this and it lives up to its expectation, great.

ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix F500EXR Red 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with Fujinon 15x Super Wide Angle Zoom Lens (Red)
